Spells:
Chain Lightning (O6 Evoc): R1200' Bolt inflicts 20d6 HP to primary target (DC 19 Ref half) and 20 secondary targets in 30' radius (DC 19 Ref +2 half)
Color Spray (O1 Illu): R15' Cone renders creatures with 2/4/any HD unconscious for 2d4 rd/blind for 1d4 rd/stunned for 1 rd (DC 14 Will neg)
Commune (Star Chart5 Divi): Deity answers 20 yes/no questions
Daylight (O3 Evoc): Touched increases light level by 1 in 60' radius for 200 min
Fly (Lure Of The Heavens3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed and +10 Fly skill for 20 min
Hypnotic Pattern (O2 Illu): R300' Fascinates 2d4+10 HD of creatures in 10' radius for conc + 2 rd (DC 15 Will neg)
Levitate (Lure Of The Heavens2 Tran): R75' Self moves willing target up and down 20'/rd for 20 min
Meteor Swarm (O9 Evoc): R1200' 4 spheres inflict 6d6 HP fire in 40' radius (DC 22 Ref half), ranged touch +2d6 HP bludgeoning
Overland Flight (O5 Tran): Self gains 40' fly speed and +10 Fly skill for 20 hr
Phantasmal Killer (Dweller In Darkness4 Illu): R300' Fears of target create creature (DC 23 Will neg) whose touch kills target (DC 23 Fort suffers 3d6 HP)
Prismatic Spray (O7 Evoc): R60' Cone blinds targets w/up to 8 HD for 2d4 rd, other harmful effects
Rage (Mantle Of Moonlight3 Ench): R300' 6 willing targets in 15' radius gain +2 Strength and Constitution, +1 Will, suffer -2 AC for conc + 20 rd
Rainbow Pattern (O4 Illu): R300' Fascinates 24 HD of creatures in 20' radius for conc + 20 rd (DC 17 Will neg)
Sunburst (O8 Evoc): R1200' 80' radius blinds and inflicts 6d6 HP (undead and oozes 20d6 HP) (DC 21 Ref half HP only)
Weird (Dweller In Darkness9 Illu): R300' Fears of targets in 15' radius create creatures (DC 23 Will neg) whose touch kills targets (DC 23 Fort suffer 3d6 HP, -1d4 Str, stunned for 1 rd)
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Awesome Display: Treats illusion targets as having 3 fewer HD
Dweller In Darkness: Can use Weird effects 1/dy
Elemental Spell (Cold): May convert half or all spell damage to cold damage; uses +1 spell slot
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Guiding Star: May use Empower Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell outdoors without cost 1/night
Lure Of The Heavens: May use Levitate effects to hover 6" at will, Fly effects for 20 min/dy
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Moonlight Bridge: 10' x 200' span provides passage for 1 dy or until self crosses 3/dy
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May force spell target to take worse of 2 saving throws; uses +2 spell slot
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Star Chart: May use Commune effects via 10 min contemplation 1/dy
